00018 class Symbol
00019 {
00020         public:

00042         void setEncodedData( vector<int> const& ec );

00044         void setAsciiEquivalent( int ae );
00045         void setTextEquivalent( string &te );
00046         
00047         private:
00048         //ivars
00049         int leadingElement;                                                                                                                                                     //0 for space, 1 for bar
00050         int intercharacterGap;                                                                                                                                          //0..n as multiple of X width
00051         int symbolType;                                                                                                                                                         //0,1..4 indicates data or specific non-data type
00052         vector<int>encodedSymbol;                                                                                                                                       //vector of element widths as multiples of X width
00053         int forcePosition;                                                                                                                                                      //int value to specify ultimate position in destination array
00054         int asciiEquivalent;
00055         string textEquivalent;
00056

00058 };
